SUMMARY 12/26/2013 - Hive cdh4-0.10.0_4.5.0_patch219
PATCH JIRA: https://jira.cloudera.com/browse/PATCH-219
This patch is built on top of cdh4-0.10.0_4.5.0_patch205 and add a fix to Hive Metastore

PATCH-219:
===================================================================================================
DISTRO-557:Backport HIVE-5524 - Unwanted delay in getting Hive metastore connection with METASTORE_CLIENT_CONNECT_RETRY_DELAY

PATCH-205:
===================================================================================================
CDH-15853: Querying avro table with empty partition folders raises exceptions

Base Branch:
CDH4.5.0-release
